text: Uye (rangarirai) apo Dhiyabhorosi akaita kuti zvakaipa zvavo zviite sezvakanaka, achiti: “Hakuna munhu anokwanisa kukukundai zuva ranhasi (rehondo yeBadr) uye chokwadi ndini muvakidzani wenyu (parubetsero).” Asi mauto maviri pavakaonana, akatiza ndokuti: “Zvirokwazvo, handina chokuita nemi. Chokwadi ndinoona zvamusingaoni. Chokwadi, ndinotya Allah nokuti Allah vanorwadzisa pakuranga.”
